A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a fast paced action extravaganza from start to finish and a fantastic film made with loving dedication to the Original Trilogy within its own right.  Excellent Story\, Excellent Battles and Visual Effects\, Excellent Drama and Character Interaction and a Brilliant Return to form for the Star Wars Universe for fans young & old\, or indeed new to these Cinematic Universes.
